attributes.action: regulate the costs of nuturing / spaying of animals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the fees for this was reduced to make it afordable, it would in turn reduce the ammount of unwanted puppies and kittens  etc which people end up with .PDSA help but it is not enough as they can only do as much as their charity funds will let them.
